ygData.subject: Re: Suggested Modification For Invocation of Delta-Coding

>

eter combinations that "normal" usage might not encounter. One 
> such inst=
ance is the invocation of delta-coding when the number of 
> sorted_species=
 is one. The following code modification to is 
suggested:

tion::epoch(int generation,Population* pop)

 there is stagnation, perform delta-coding
